entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@donwinslow Thanks for doing this. 
Having a COVID-19 vaccine doesn't depend on a certain person being president. But we're more likely to have one & get it distributed if we have a Democrat in the White House bc our party supports scientists & believes in using experts.
